segments.text: This one is . I have another one that's furnished , but I'm not sure you'll like the furniture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have tons of furniture . What we need are air conditioners .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This building is only four years old . It was built with central air .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just like in the States ! That's perfect !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I recently bought an American-style washer and dryer . Come and see .
segments.speaker: S2
